title: Lvl 1 Spells
content: ject enemies with a potent poison. Range: 18m Warlock Find Familiar: Quasit Conjuration Action Level 1 Spell Slot No Summon a familiar with the form and statistics of a quasit that can frighten enemies. Range: 18m Warlock Find Familiar: Rat Conjuration ActionLevel 1 Spell Slot No Summon a familiar with the form and statistics of a rat. Its infectious bite can spread disease. (Lasts until the end of a long rest) Range: 18m Wizard Find Familiar: Raven Conjuration ActionLevel 1 Spell Slot No Summon
